text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: It was spring when I was finally accepted into Tracen Academy. My mother was so happy when she saw the academy's brochure.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: “This academy seems to have various events to show their appreciation towards their students. Look, they even have Halloween and Christmas parties for the dorms!”

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: “I'm sure you'll make a lot of friends there, Rob Roy-chan. I hope you make the most out of your time at Tracen Academy.”

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (…First impressions are very important when it comes to making friends. That's why I practiced introducing myself. I should go and reach out to some people…)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ughh… Why am I so…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Ah, that's right! If you live in a dormitory, you're meant to have a roommate! So she must be…)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: U-Umm…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I… Umm…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (If I suddenly ask her to be my friend… won't she just think that I'm some weird Uma Musume?)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (If you tell someone that you'd like for them to be your friend it's the same as telling them you don't have any friends… If I were to confess something that embarrassing, she would definitely keep her distance from me…)
(Squeeze…)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: S-Sorry… It's just that, when I would get nervous my mother would hold my hands… and that usually made me feel better…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I-I'm so sorry…! I did something weird didn't I…!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: N-No, it was nothing like that! I… Umm… Err…!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Would you be willing to be my friend…?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Whenever Rice-san did something like this, it was always for someone else's sake…)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (I think Rice-san wants to speak with Bourbon-san…)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (I'm sure I'm right about this. But despite knowing, all I can do is stand and watch. There's nothing I can do to help, after all.)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (It would be strange if I suddenly went up to Rice-san and Bourbon-san… Not to mention, since it's me I would just end up confusing them both. I need someone better at talking than I am…)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (But what I really need… What I really need to do is…)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ah… A transformation, a masquerade… The ability to become someone different from yourself… In a dream-like place…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: A place brimming with costumes and endless stories… A country of dreams that will only be here for a limited time… Halloween Land…!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: This is it…! If I could get everyone to come here…!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: It seems as though presently there is an error regarding the planning of the Halloween party… Analysis of past information is required in order to properly complete the mission.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Calculating the possibility of failure after one week. Arrangements for the props, which were a concern, have completed. Therefore, I surmise that it is not the application of my plans that causes failure, but something more fundamental…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I tried to talk to Bourbon-san last night… but when Tamamo-san and Creek-san appeared so suddenly…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I was worried that if I suddenly showed up I would just get in everyone's way… I was so scared… My legs were shaking… Then I realized…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (I need to stop this… There's no point in being worried all of the time…)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (But at the same time, calling out to you so suddenly would probably upset you…)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Y-You two…!! Become my familiars!!

text_block_list.name: Rice & Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Ehh…? Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: That was meant for the two of you…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eh!? M-Me…?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Yes, I have something to request of the two of you! Come with me to an amusement park!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: This amusement park is hosting a Halloween event, but going alone would be no fun. We did promise one another we'd help each other, didn't we?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I've also heard that this amusement park is sooo much fun! It seems that the former head of the planning committee, Inari-san, used this as a reference for the party she threw!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Anyways, it seems like an amazing place. I want to go so bad, so…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Become my familiars and come with me!! D-Do you understand!?

text_block_list.name: Ritto Student
text_block_list.text: Tamamo-senpaii! Please help me! You see, I was trying to fix this frayed hem…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ahh, no worries! I'll take care of it, so just leave it there.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Now all we need to do is check the costumes for the Miho dormitory, right…? I need to gather the girls who haven't finished their costume fittings.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Okay. Things are going great. I'll go and check on Bourbon to see if she needs any help…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: I heard that Bourbon-san went to that insanely scary amusement park! Did she go there to collect data cause she's been stressing about the Halloween party?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Eh? Who'd she go with? I don't think she'd go alone… but at the same time when I offered to help her before, she refused… Jeez, I wish she'd learn to rely on us some more.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: She's… at it again, ain't she… Damnit… Creek, you comin' too?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, well of course! I'll go and get ready♪

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Woah, there's so many pumpkins! They're so cute…! And the dancers are wearing such poofy outfits…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Hehe, that's not where we are headed. Ah… Umm… You two, come along now! The place we're headed is…

text_block_list.name: Zombie
text_block_list.text: Braaaains…

text_block_list.name: Mysterious Sound
text_block_list.text: (Skrrrrrt… Skrrrrrt… Squeeeaak…)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Th-This is the pla-…
(Pshhhh! Brrrrmm…)

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Everyone, hold onto your tails! Hurry! Or they'll be grabbed!!

text_block_list.name: Zombie
text_block_list.text: Kyaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Rice & Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Kyaaaa!?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice-san!? Rob Roy-san!?
An echoing scream rang through the night. Rice Shower and Zenno Rob Roy managed to escape. Unable to be stopped by Mihono Bourbon, those 2 wandered into a city crawling with zombies.
The 3 of them have wandered into the frightening Halloween zone. What awaited them there was…
